page.title: 17LOCAL AMENITIES
page.content: Information Centre:Books accommodation and gives details of Hotels,bed and breakfast, cottages, holiday flats and two small caravan sites. Provides information on events and places of interest. Helps with Meals etc.. Facilities: Shops include 3 Bread,3 Meat,Fish,4 Vegetables and Fruit, 3 for Maps and Guides,Camping or Calor Gas for Stoves, Souvenir Shops and Clothes,Milk, Films and Pet Food. There is a weekly market also garages and a Sub Post Office. Toilet Facilities and a Doctor's Surgery. Recreation: James Herriot books have publicised the beautiful countryside. Seats on Shawl walks, 2 Castles,2 Abbeys and ancient churches in locality. Candlemakers, Chandler Gallery and the local theatre and Library attract visitors.
